Text: If it's free from Microsoft, then why would I download it here? Shouldn't the Microsoft site provide the most reliable and up-to-date download?

Free a/v like this should be downloaded directly...just to guarantee safety and security. After all, it is a security product...lol...how can you protect yourself if the product has been compromised? lol

you can download MSE from MS site, google them if u dont want to download it here in TPB.
and AFAIK, TPB isn't for illegal stuff only, any one are welcome to share anything...
